title: Group portrait of twenty-two women of Decks Club, seated: president Lois Hall, Mary Shelton, Alma Speed Fox, Ida Mae Mauney, Norma Malone, Vivian Mason, and Marion Harris Slater; second row: Elizabeth Hill, Vonda Burwell, Jessie Boyd, Mildred Bass, Betty Tibbs, Evelyn Anderson, Mildred Britton, Anna Mae English, Betty Williams, Ruth Mellix, and Thelma Burgess; third row: Jane Lewis Williams, Kay Jones, Lorena Bowler, and Thelma Dunning, posed in front of Christmas tree in Loendi Club, another version
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
